name: Chuk Stuck
description:
You play as Chuk who was just eaten by a giant head and is now stuck trying to find his way out.

In this Beat 'em up platformer you have to beat up the Gooeys in order to find the key that unlocks the door to the next room.

Will you be able to escape and set Chuk free?

OST: https://mcfluff.bandcamp.com/album/chuk-stuck-ost

This game was submitted to Global Game Jam 2021
All assets were made by us during the Jam

Programming - IsacDee
Art - Manaspurt
Music/Sound - Mcfluff
